kellin (Kyoungil Lee)

Application Developer

About Myself

I have started my career as a application developers in 2008. Since then I have worked at various size of companies, startups to large enterprise and expanded my skill sets to include application developers, and system engineer. I am a passionate professional person who believes in importance of interactions between different roles at work. Trying to understand how operations work helped me to build better applications and I encourage my co-workers to understand the underlying infrastructures and systems in order to meet efficiency and pace of ever changing environment. I participate in various user groups, to learn about emerging technology trends and learn from other developers / architects / operators.

Experience

Graduate from university

I majored in computer science at a four-year university.

March 2008

application developer

I finished my military duties at a company chosen by the Military Manpower Administration as an alternative to serving in the military. the companies are Asadal and Gabia. Asadal(http://www.asadal.com) provides shopping mall solutions and domain registration services and Gabia(http://www.gabia.com) provides web hosting / development and domain services.

May 2008

Service Developer

I worked at a NHN I&S(https://www.naverins.com/ins/index.nhn). My main job was to maintain Wingbus, part of Wingspoon services. Wingbus was the travel information service and very successful in early stage of service. The job required me to work with PHP, MySQL, Java and Spring framework. Because I was the only person to maintain the Wingbus service, I had to be very time efficient and think about automation and systematic approach to every issue and problem I faced.

January 2011

e-commerce company

I worked at a CJ O Shopping(http://www.cjenm.com/index_en.html)). I'm in the Development team. Our team's role is high performance, respond of the high traffic, develop smart phone application and UI,UX develop at e-commerce. My part is high performance, respond of the high traffic of these.

Sept 2014 - Sept 2015

messenger, portal company

I am previous working as e-commerce platform developer in Kakao corp(http://www.kakaocorp.com/en/main) which is the #1 messenger company in Korea.
And now I working at backend e-commerce and http rest api application platform developer in Naver corp(https://www.navercorp.com/en) which is the #1 portal company in Korea.

May 2015 - Current
